sentences.chinese: 她還跟那個異教徒一起麼？

sentences.english: The focus within the game is for the player to investigate the activity of an group of cultist.
sentences.chinese: 玩家的任務是要調查某異教的組織的活動。

sentences.english: But this girl was a non-believer.
sentences.chinese: 況且，這個女子是一個異教徒。

sentences.english: These are things that are very common in polytheistic and pagan practices.
sentences.chinese: 這些在多神崇拜和異教行爲中很常見。

sentences.english: He was a pagan … who worshiped idols .
sentences.chinese: 他以前是個拜偶像的異教徒。

sentences.english: He was declared a heretic, and excommunicated from the Church.
sentences.chinese: 他被宣佈爲異教徒，並被驅逐出教會。

sentences.english: The two heretics were burned at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 兩名異教徒被捆在木樁上燒死了。

sentences.english: Every gentile nation had its own sybil versed in this science, and we find mention of twelve of them.
sentences.chinese: 每一個異教民族都有精通這門學問的西比爾。

sentences.english: His commission was to convert the local heathens to Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 他的使命就是使當地的異教徒改信基督教。

sentences.english: What follows is an abstract of the Summa contra Gentiles.
sentences.chinese: 以下是《異教徒駁議輯要》的一個摘要。

sentences.english: In fact, Easter was originally a pagan festival .
sentences.chinese: 而事實上，最初的復活節是異教徒的節日。

sentences.english: Currently I am studying the older, pagan religions of Arcanum.
sentences.chinese: 目前我正在研究奧祕中古老的異教信仰。

sentences.english: Dymphna was a virgin daughter of a pagan king.
sentences.chinese: 鄧娜是一位異教徒國王的女兒，並且還是處子之身。

sentences.english: He will not tolerate any deviation in the service of alien gods.
sentences.chinese: 他無法容忍對任何異教神靈的偏向。

sentences.english: To not do so was almost heresy.
sentences.chinese: 不這樣做的話，就是異教徒。

sentences.english: So what keeps heretics from interpreting this text in false ways?
sentences.chinese: 那是什麼阻止了異教徒用錯誤的方式解讀經文呢？

definition: the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
